Point","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc810464-f9ed-4396-88c5-3d97744d511d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CustomLoader","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the bridge between Python's import system and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ImportManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It's deployed by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ImportManager.install_hooks()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and removed by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ImportManager.remove_hooks()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"71ff963e-1606-4fd6-82fb-a47bfa4d2983","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1487a9e7-c040-4743-b672-90b6f8c4c6d3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e825e04-1c25-4d24-b321-6f064e34dc41","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CustomLoader","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" serves as the runtime \"sensor\" that detects and records module imports, enabling the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ImportManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to build a complete dependency graph without requiring explicit instrumentation of the analyzed code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c307fe11-8b39-473a-956c-4049c67f993e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
